articles.description: u00a0As more details regarding Arsenal's deal for David Luiz emerge, more criticism is made. However, the real error is not the deal but the signing and overp...
articles.content:
If you were to take everything you read on Twitter as gospel, Arsenal made one of the worst decisions in the history of the club to sign David Luiz for £8 million last summer.
More details emerged t… [+3407 chars]
